channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 🟠 17:20 Attention !!! Threat of use of managed aviation bombs (cabin).
item.description: 🟠 17:20 Attention !!! Threat of use of managed aviation bombs (cabin).#Vasylivsky_ district This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 🟡 17:10 The threat of shelling in Nikopol and the Nikopol Territorial Community. Find out, the alarm is still in:- Nikopol district
item.description: 🟡 17:10 The threat of shelling in Nikopol and the Nikopol Territorial Community. Find out, the alarm is still in:- Nikopol district#m_nikopol_that_ti-Nikopol_The. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
